H0.text: What was the value of the former British coin the groat. ONE PENNY

H1.text: What was the value of the former British coin the groat. SIXPENCE

H2.text: What was the value of the former British coin the groat. ONE SHILLING

H3.text: What was the value of the former British coin the groat. FOUR (OLD) PENCE

A4.text: The groat was a fourpence coin.
